GRP-ANNOUNCEMENT-READERS.description: Group Tenancy global readers of OCI monitoring information.

GRP-AUDITORS.name: group-auditors
GRP-AUDITORS.description: Group Tenancy global read access (for security auditing or health checks).

GRP-NETWORK-ADMINS.name: group-network-admins
GRP-NETWORK-ADMINS.description: Group Tenancy global and shared network administration group, including common LZ network elements.

GRP-SECURITY-ADMINS.name: group-security-admins
GRP-SECURITY-ADMINS.description: Group Tenancy global and shared security administration group.

GRP-LZP-P-DWH-ADMINS.name: group-lzp-p-dwh-admins
GRP-LZP-P-DWH-ADMINS.description: Group responsible for administrating PROD/DWH related applications.

GRP-LZP-PP-DWH-ADMINS.description: Group responsible for administrating PREPROD/DWH related applications.

GRP-LZP-D-DWH-ADMINS.name: group-lzp-d-dwh-admins

policy-SERVICES.name: policy-services
policy-SERVICES.description: POL.00 Open LZ policy for all supported resources in the tenancy.
statements: allow service cloudguard to manage cloudevents-rules in tenancy where target.rule.type='managed'
allow service cloudguard to read tenancies in tenancy
allow service cloudguard to read all-resources in tenancy
allow service cloudguard to use network-security-groups in tenancy
Allow any-user to { WLP_BOM_READ } in tenancy where all { request.principal.id = target.agent.id, request.principal.type = 'workloadprotectionagent'}
Allow any-user to { WLP_CONFIG_READ } in tenancy where all { request.principal.id = target.agent.id, request.principal.type = 'workloadprotectionagent'}
Endorse any-user to { WLP_LOG_CREATE } in any-tenancy where all { request.principal.id = target.agent.id, request.principal.type = 'workloadprotectionagent' }
Endorse any-user to { WLP_METRICS_CREATE } in any-tenancy where all { request.principal.id = target.agent.id, request.principal.type = 'workloadprotectionagent' }
Endorse any-user to { WLP_ADHOC_QUERY_READ } in any-tenancy where all { request.principal.id = target.agent.id, request.principal.type = 'workloadprotectionagent' }
Endorse any-user to { WLP_ADHOC_RESULTS_CREATE } in any-tenancy where all { request.principal.id = target.agent.id, request.principal.type = 'workloadprotectionagent'}
allow service vulnerability-scanning-service to manage instances in tenancy
allow service vulnerability-scanning-service to read compartments in tenancy
allow service vulnerability-scanning-service to read repos in tenancy
allow service vulnerability-scanning-service to read vnics in tenancy
allow service vulnerability-scanning-service to read vnic-attachments in tenancy
allow service osms to read instances in tenancy
allow service blockstorage, oke, streaming, Fssoc1Prod, objectstorage-eu-frankfurt-1 to use keys in tenancy

policy-IAM-ADMINISTRATION.name: policy-iam-administration
policy-IAM-ADMINISTRATION.description: POL.01 Open LZ allows group-iam-admins group users to manage IAM resoures in the tenancy.
statements: allow group group-iam-admins to inspect users in tenancy

allow group group-iam-admins to manage users in tenancy where all {request.operation != 'ListApiKeys',request.operation != 'ListAuthTokens',request.operation != 'ListCustomerSecretKeys',request.operation != 'UploadApiKey',request.operation != 'DeleteApiKey',request.operation != 'UpdateAuthToken',request.operation != 'CreateAuthToken',request.operation != 'DeleteAuthToken',request.operation != 'CreateSecretKey',request.operation != 'UpdateCustomerSecretKey',request.operation != 'DeleteCustomerSecretKey'}
allow group group-iam-admins to inspect groups in tenancy
allow group group-iam-admins to read policies in tenancy
allow group group-iam-admins to manage groups in tenancy where all {target.group.name != 'Administrators',target.group.name != 'group-credential-admins'}
allow group group-iam-admins to inspect identity-providers in tenancy
allow group group-iam-admins to manage identity-providers in tenancy where any {request.operation = 'AddIdpGroupMapping', request.operation = 'DeleteIdpGroupMapping'}
allow group group-iam-admins to manage dynamic-groups in tenancy
allow group group-iam-admins to manage authentication-policies in tenancy
allow group group-iam-admins to manage network-sources in tenancy
allow group group-iam-admins to manage quota in tenancy
allow group group-iam-admins to use cloud-shell in tenancy
allow group group-iam-admins to manage tag-defaults in tenancy
allow group group-iam-admins to manage tag-namespaces in tenancy
allow group group-iam-admins to manage orm-jobs in tenancy
allow group group-iam-admins to manage orm-config-source-providers in tenancy

policy-CREDENTIAL-ADMINISTRATION.name: policy-credential-administration
policy-CREDENTIAL-ADMINISTRATION.description: POL.02 Open LZ policy which allows group-credential-admins group users to manage user credentials of local users in the tenancy .
statements: allow group group-credential-admins to inspect users in tenancy
allow group group-credential-admins to inspect groups in tenancy

allow group group-credential-admins to manage users in tenancy where any {request.operation = 'ListApiKeys',request.operation = 'ListAuthTokens',request.operation = 'ListCustomerSecretKeys',request.operation = 'UploadApiKey',request.operation = 'DeleteApiKey',request.operation = 'UpdateAuthToken',request.operation = 'CreateAuthToken',request.operation = 'DeleteAuthToken',request.operation = 'CreateSecretKey',request.operation = 'UpdateCustomerSecretKey',request.operation = 'DeleteCustomerSecretKey',request.operation = 'UpdateUserCapabilities'}
allow group group-credential-admins to use cloud-shell in tenancy

policy-ANNOUNCEMENT-READERS.name: policy-announcement-readers
policy-ANNOUNCEMENT-READERS.description: POL.03 Open LZ policy which allows group-announcement-readers group users to read OCI announcements in the tenancy.
statements: allow group group-announcement-readers to read announcements in tenancy
allow group group-announcement-readers to use cloud-shell in tenancy

policy-BUDGET-ADMINISTRATION.name: policy-budget-administration
policy-BUDGET-ADMINISTRATION.description: POL.04 Open LZ policy which allows group-budget-admins group users to manage all budget resources in the tenancy.
statements: define tenancy usage-report as ocid1.tenancy.oc1..aaaaaaaaned4fkpkisbwjlr56u7cj63lf3wffbilvqknstgtvzub7vhqkggq
endorse group group-budget-admins to read objects in tenancy usage-report
allow group group-budget-admins to manage usage-report in tenancy
allow group group-budget-admins to manage usage-budgets in tenancy

policy-AUDITING.name: policy-auditing
policy-AUDITING.description: POL.05 Open LZ policy which allows group-auditors group users to read all the resources in the tenancy.
statements: allow group group-auditors to inspect all-resources in tenancy
allow group group-auditors to read instances in tenancy
allow group group-auditors to read load-balancers in tenancy
allow group group-auditors to read buckets in tenancy
allow group group-auditors to read nat-gateways in tenancy
allow group group-auditors to read public-ips in tenancy
allow group group-auditors to read file-family in tenancy
allow group group-auditors to read instance-configurations in tenancy
allow group group-auditors to read network-security-groups in tenancy
allow group group-auditors to read resource-availability in tenancy
allow group group-auditors to read audit-events in tenancy
allow group group-auditors to read users in tenancy
allow group group-auditors to use cloud-shell in tenancy
allow group group-auditors to read vss-family in tenancy
allow group group-auditors to read usage-budgets in tenancy
allow group group-auditors to read usage-reports in tenancy
allow group group-auditors to read data-safe-family in tenancy
